name: stickerboards
description: Stickerboards monorepo (API + Web) with shared tooling and documentation

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm -w stickerboards-api run dev" "npm -w stickerboards-web run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.optimize:assets: npm -w @stickerboards/image-pipeline run build && npm -w @stickerboards/image-pipeline run optimize
